statements: SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT email, full_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, preferences FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, email, age FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT full_name, preferences->>'language' AS preferred_language FROM user_profiles WHERE preferences->>'theme' = 'Dark';
SELECT user_id, gender, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles
SELECT username, phone_number FROM user_profiles
SELECT user_id, username, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY first_name
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_name = 'theme';
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, gender FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_type = 'Notification';
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM AIRecommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;

SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM AIRecommendations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) as num_recommendations FROM AIRecommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(recommendation_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, first_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme, dark_mode FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_interests WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_score FROM ai_recommendations ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE '%joh%';
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE timezone = 'UTC';
SELECT user_id, interest_id FROM user_interests ORDER BY user_id DESC, interest_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, address FROM user_profiles WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, category, preference, created_at FROM user_preferences ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating = 5;

SELECT user_id, address FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
